snippet.title: SCP-087
snippet.description:
A clip from my short experimental horror game SCP-087.
Features procedural generation of floors and events, so every playthrough is different.
SCP-087-B and similar are not made by me.
Available for download: 

Windows : http://www.mediafire.com/?y655d73rffnnm0p

Mac : http://www.mediafire.com/?zn1e31f5sro0bn7

I am surprised by the reception to this little coffee-break experiment.
This "game" is a result of about 2 days of fiddling around in Unity in my spare time, but people expect an actual game from it for some reason.
I didn't plan on expanding this, but now I think I will.
If you have a suggestion or general feedback for the expanded version, please message me on YouTube or leave a comment to this video.

Pictures from the upcoming version.
http://i.imgur.com/f1C7E.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/fczmk.jpg
http://imgur.com/Wpxbbip
http://imgur.com/Cgkp8ft

Based on this(originally written by Zaeyde): http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-087

UPDATE 30/08/12

The summer release date has obviously slipped by, but the project is not abandoned. I had to do a bit of freelancing and mobile development during the summer due to some financial troubles, so there wasn't really any time to work on the game.

I won't give an estimated release date anymore, but I certainly intend to finish the game.

Thanks for your interest and support.
